text:
Hey,

Can someone advise or guide me in the right direction to see a general revision history for all files in design tool? Greatly appreciate your help!
Select the file. Then under action is where you wanna look
Thanks <@U38EZFVFE> is there a way to view changes of all files as opposed to having to view revision history for each file individually?
if you are working localy (which i recomend) you can use git for that
ah ok thanks for your help Chad much appreciated :slightly_smiling_face:
